item.description:
The plan is to meet up at Redbones for dinner early on Saturday afternoon (I've lived in Davis for well on three years now -- just discovered they served sweet tea.), then head out into Davis Square, starting probably at the Joshua Tree, hitting the Burren, and winding our way to other establishments if the mood strikes us.

So I'm thinking:

3 p.m. Joshua Tree -- 256 Elm St., Somerville
3:45 p.m. Sligo Pub -- 237 Elm St.
4:30 p.m. The Burren -- 247 Elm St.

Since we're a small group, there's some flexibility involved. If you're joining up, just give me a call to figure out where we are.
item.how_to_find_us: They don't do reservations, per se, but I'll get there early and stake out a claim at the bar downstairs. Once we've got a crew together, we can get seated. Look for the guy in the Auburn hat.
item.name: First Annual Quentin Compson Memorial (Dignified) Pub Crawl
